articles.description: Cumbria's top health chief Colin Cox says recent figures showing Barrow as the country's top coronavirus hotspot should be viewed with caution.
articles.content:
Cumbria's top health chief Colin Cox says recent figures showing Barrow as the country's top coronavirus hotspot should be viewed with caution.

articles.title: Northants NHS worker ill with Covid-19, says trust chairman - Northamptonshire Telegraph
articles.description: A number of Northants hospital staff have also been affected by the virus according to hospital chair, Alan Burns
articles.content:
A staff member from one of the countys two hospitals is ill with Covid-19, the trust chairman said at a meeting.

articles.title: Africa facing a quarter of a billion coronavirus cases, WHO predicts - The Guardian
articles.description: But continent will have fewer deaths than Europe and US because of its younger population and other lifestyle factors
articles.content:
